column4: I have maked difference users for ProfileManager by firefox and thunderbird. My question: how make I file in the folder --> hello, how make i file --> firefox -no-remote -P "Another Profile". I use Ubuntu 11.10
not sure i understand, do you want to make different profiles for different users?
Normal i can make a file on Desktop, phlak_user (copy for firefox by headmain to desktop and paste). but i have ubutnu 11.10 now, i can not copy and paste. how copy i firefox on desktop , phlak_user
how copy i firefox on the desktop?
/ phlak_user , can you help me please? :S
Where can I copy / paste "firefox" on the desktop, phlak_user
navigate to the firefox binary (may be in /usr/share/applications) , right click > copy to > desktop
